original_title: Athens 2004: Olympic Closing Ceremony (Games of the XXVIII Olympiad)
overview: The games of the 28th summer olympiad returned to the birthplace of the Olympics - Athens, Greece. The games ran from August 13 to 29th 2004.
tagline: The games of the 28th summer Olympiad returned to the birthplace of the Olympics - Athens, Greece
title: Athens 2004: Olympic Closing Ceremony (Games of the XXVIII Olympiad)
